name: The Tower (itch) (AloeveraNinja)
description:
You have 14 minutes to make your way to the the top of the tower. Collect gems along the way and be wary of enemies.

  • A simple pixel art platformer
  • Aim for the fastest time with the most points

                              

Music Credits:

Kevin Macleoud

  • Myst on the Moor: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4104-myst-on-the-moor
  • Earth Prelude: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3690-earth-prelude

Bio:

I'm a first year Game Art student and this is my very first game. I always loved platformers so I decided to create one for my first project! It was put together in a couple of weeks and this is the final result. Hope you enjoy :)

Contact: aloeveraninja11@gmail.com
